eventScripts.script:
'''
	Get data from Kidde api. Refer to the global script
	When response ok, turn on connected bit.
	'''
	rootPath = '[default]sensors/kidde/'
	bufferTagPath = '[default]sensors/kidde/api/buffer'
	try:
		response = sensors.kiddeSmoke.getData()
		if response:
			system.tag.writeBlocking([bufferTagPath], [response])
			readBack = system.tag.readBlocking(bufferTagPath)[0].value
			for idx in range(len(readBack)):
				tagPath = rootPath + 'sensor_%d'%idx
				returnPath = g_script.tags.browseTag(tagPath)
				content = readBack[idx]
				returnData = g_script.tags.formatTags(content)
				writePathList,writeValueList=g_script.tags.formatToWritableList(tagPath, returnData, returnPath)
				system.tag.writeBlocking(writePathList, writeValueList)
			
			# set connected to true to indicated that API successfully called and wrote the tags.
			system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]sensors/kidde/connected'], [1])
		
		else:
			system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]sensors/kidde/connected'], [0])
	except:
		# when failed, turn off connected bit.
		system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]sensors/kidde/connected'], [0])

transforms.code:
# Define a base path to be used to write at.
	parentPath = '[default]playground'
	
	# Initialize the configuration for system.tag.configure
	tagConfig = {}
	collisionPolicy = 'o'
	tagConfigList = []
	
	# Format the tag configuration
	for item in value.keys():
		itemType = g_script.probeScript.typeCheckForTagConfig(value[item])
		path = parentPath + '/'+ item
		name = item
		
		if itemType == 'Folder':
			tagType = itemType
#			tagType= 'AtomicTag',
#			dataType = itemType,
#			valueSource = 'memory',
#			tagValue = value[item]}
		elif itemType != 'Folder':
			tagType = 'AtomicTag'
			dataType = itemType
			valueSource = 'memory'
			tagValue = value[item]
		
#		tagConfig["path"] = path
		tagConfig["dataType"] = dataType
		tagConfig["tagType"] = tagType
		tagConfig["name"] = name
		tagConfig["valueSource"] = valueSource
		tagConfig["value"] = tagValue
		tagConfigList.append(tagConfig)
		tagConfig = {}
#	response = system.tag.configure(parentPath, tagConfigList, collisionPolicy)
	response = system.tag.getConfiguration('[default]sensors/kidde',recursive=True)
	return response
